title: Indicted ‘Bitcoin Jesus’ pays Roger Stone $600,000 to lobby for him
summary: Indicted ‘Bitcoin Jesus,’ the cryptocurrency entrepreneur Roger Ver, paid Roger Stone $600,000 to lobby Trump to change the federal fraud law he was charged with violating
